title: nmfs-opensci/py-rocket-base: py-rocket-base
description:
The py-rocket-base image is a base image for JupyterHubs with Python and RStudio. It installs a Jupyter and JupyterHub environment that builds on the Pangeo base-image and creates the R and RStudio environment using Rocker installation scripts.

Image: ghcr.io/nmfs-opensci/py-rocket-base

The base image provides the following support:

  • Python + JupyterLab with mamba handling package installation
  • R + JupyterLab using an R installation provided via Rocker
  • R + RStudio with the Rocker verse environment pre-installed
  • Desktop VNC for installing applications, including Java-based tools
  • VS Code OSS with extensions for Jupyter notebooks and Quarto
  • Publishing suite: Quarto, JupyterBook, MyST, Pandoc, TeX Live, Zotero
  • pyrocket_scripts to assist with common customization tasks
  • rocker_scripts for extending the R/RStudio environment

Rocker installation scripts are licensed under GPL-2.0-or-later and retain their original license.
